Name: LSU Digital Art Website and Social Media Maintenance
Description: Maintain LSU Digital Art Website and Social Media across multiple platforms including Instagram, Facebook, Vimeo, and Tumblr to promote digital art programs and engage with prospective students. Platforms include https://instagram.com/lsudigitalart, http://design.lsu.edu/art/programs/digital-art/, facebook.com/groups/digitalada, vimeo.com/lsudigitalart, and lsudigitalart.tumblr.com.

Name: Prospective Student Tours
Description: Tour prospective undergraduate, graduate students, and school groups to showcase digital art facilities and programs at LSU.

Name: Digital Art BFA and MFA Selective Admissions Oversight
Description: Oversee selective admissions process for Digital art BFA and MFA programs, including application review and candidate evaluation.

Name: St. Joseph Academy Student Mentor
Description: Student mentor providing guidance and support to students from St. Joseph Academy.

Name: LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day
Description: Presenter for Digital Media at LSU during the College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day, showcasing digital art programs to prospective students.

Name: CampQuest Tour
Description: Presenter for CampQuest Tour, introducing digital art programs and facilities to visiting participants.

Name: LSU School of Art Open House
Description: Digital Art Presenter at LSU School of Art Open House, demonstrating digital art programs and technologies to prospective students and families.

Name: LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day
Description: Presenter for Digital Media at LSU during the College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day, showcasing digital art programs to accepted students.

Name: LSU Digital Art Catalog Development
Description: Developed content and helped with design for the LSU Digital Art Catalog in collaboration with School of Art Graphic Design Student Office.

Name: Broadmoar High School Digital Media Tour
Description: Organizer for Broadmoar High School Digital Media Tour at LSU School of Art & Center for Computation & Technology, facilitating educational outreach to high school students.

Name: Patrick Taylor High School Digital Media Tour
Description: Presenter for Patrick Taylor High School Digital Media Tour at LSU Center for Computation & Technology, showcasing digital art programs to high school students.

Name: Digital Art Showcase at LSU Tailgating with the Dean
Description: Organizer for Digital Art Showcase during LSU Tailgating with the Dean event, promoting digital art programs to university community and visitors in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: LSU Digital Art Website Content Creation
Description: Wrote original copy for the LSU Digital Art Website to promote digital art programs and provide information to prospective students.

Name: Digital Art Student Work Showcase Website
Description: Developed a website to showcase Digital Art Student Work at http://digitalplusart.tumblr.com, providing a platform for student portfolio display and program promotion.
